Translations.Text: His companion, (the Satan in the Hell) will say: "Our Lord! I did not make him transgress, but he was (himself) far away (from good)
He (Allah) will say: "Dispute not with each other in front of Me: I had already in advance sent you the Threat and Warning
The sentence that comes from Me shall not be changed, and I do not do the least injustice to My servants
On that Day, We will ask Hell, "Are you filled to the full?" It will say: "Are there any more (to come)
And the Garden will be taken near the righteous— It will not be a far away thing
(A voice will say:) "This is what was promised for you— For every one who turned (to Allah) with true repentance, (those) who kept (His Command)
(Those) who feared (Allah), Most Gracious, Unseen, (Rahman-bil-Ghaib) and brought a heart turned in repentance (and love for Him)
Therein, you enter in peace and security; This is a Day of Eternal Life
For them, there will be all that they wish for— And more besides in Our Presence
And how many generations before them did We destroy (for their sins)— (Though) they were stronger in power than them? And they wandered through the land: Was there any place of escape (for them)
Surely in this there is a Reminder and a Message for anyone who has a heart and understanding or who gives ear and truly sees (the truth)
And indeed, We created the heavens and the earth and all between them in six Days, and no sense of tiredness touches Us
Then bear with patience, all that they say, and celebrate the Praises of your Lord, before the rising of the sun (Faj’r) and before (its) setting (Zuh’r and ‘Asr)
And during part of the night (Maghrib and Isha), (also) celebrate His praises and (glorify Him) after the prayers (of His adoration)
And listen on the Day when the Caller will call out from a place close by—
The Day when they will hear a (mighty) Blast in truth (for awakening): That will be the Day of Resurrection
Surely, it is We Who give life and cause death; And to Us is the Final Return—
On the Day when the earth will be torn apart, from (men) quickly getting out: That will be a gathering together— (It is) quite easy for Us
We know best what they say, and you (O Prophet) are not the one to bring Faith in them by force. But warn (him, the weary and confused) with the Quran such as (he, who) fears My Warning
By (the winds) that scatter (around) the dust
And those (winds) that lift and carry away heavy weights
And those that flow with ease, (joy) and gentleness
And those that distribute and rearrange by (His) Order—
Surely, that which you have been promised is indeed true
And surely, Judgment and Recompense must indeed become established
By the sky with (its) numerous paths (through it)
Truly, you are in a disagreeing opinion (about Faith and Islam)
Through (such opinions) which (people are) misled (away from the Truth) such as those who would be misled
Misery to the liars and falsehood-mongers—
Those who (are) carelessly (blundering) in a state of confusion (about the Faith of Islam)
They ask: "When will be the Day of Judgment and Recompense
(It will be) a Day when they will be tried (and burned) over the Fire
Taste you your trial! This is what you asked to be hastened
Verily, as to the righteous (with firm Faith), they will be within the Gardens and Springs
Taking joy in the things that their Lord has given them, verily, they were the doers of good deeds
They were in the habit of sleeping but little by night
And in the hours of early dawn, they (were found) praying for Forgiveness
And in their wealth and possessions (were remembered) the right of the (needy) he who asked and he who was prevented (from asking)
On the earth are Signs for those with certainty in Faith
As also in your selves: Will you not then see
And in the heavens is (beautiful) provision, and (all) that which (you) are promised
Then by the Lord of heaven and earth, this is the very Truth, as much as the fact that you can speak intelligently to each other
Has the story of the honored guests (three angels) of Ibrahim (Abraham) reached you
When they entered his presence, and said: “Peace!” He said, "Peace!" And said: "You are a people unknown to me
Then he turned quickly, to his household, brought out a fatted calf
And placed it before them... He said, "Will you not eat
(When they did not eat), he became afraid of them. They said, "Fear not," and they gave him glad tidings of a son endowed with knowledge
Then his wife came forward (laughing) aloud: She touched her face (in wonder) and said: "A barren old woman
They said, "Even so, your Lord has spoken: Verily, He is All Wise (Hakeem) and All Knowing (Aleem)
